m_szDocSumamry: Clean Car News (10 Stories) 10 more top clean car stories from the past week (other than our 13 or so clean car and transportation stories): 1. GM has ceased production of its Chevy Volt for 5 weeks. And while some are eager to call the Chevy Volt dead , Chris DeMorro of sister site Gas2 says it is anything but that. He has a long post on that (second link above), but here’s the summary: “In short, the demise of the Chevy Volt has been greatly exaggerated. I’m not saying the Volt isn’t in trouble. It’s image is tarnished, its sales are slow, and its future is uncertain. But I still wouldn’t be
